content: a friend bought a pair of pumpkin earrings at a craft show and asked if i could replicate them here is the result **finished size** about 1 in diameter x 5/8 inch high the bottom picture shows the earring resting on a quarter **materials** small amounts of fingering weight yarn in orange and brown or green i used dream in color jilly anticipation you will also need earring findings leverback hooks are shown **needles** us 0 2 0 mm dpns **gauge** 40 sts and 48 row per 4 inches gauge isn t essential knit tight
